cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
The Altima is the perfect sedan for all of your Nissan adventures.
Impress your friends and piss off poor people with this speedy roadster.
Owning this truck with provide an illusion that you actually do work that requires a truck and not a mazda miata.
Own this car from the future. 0 miles on it
